scenarios.title: Time-Travelling Tour Guide
scenarios.description: You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining modern smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
scenarios.situation: Explaining modern technology to historical figure
scenarios.tension: Making complex technology understandable to someone from a different era

scenarios.title: The Escaped Order
scenarios.description: You are a restaurant waiter who must calmly tell a customer that their order has escaped the kitchen.
scenarios.tension: Maintaining composure while explaining the impossible

scenarios.title: Cursed Return
scenarios.description: You are a customer trying to return an obviously cursed object to a very skeptical shop owner.

scenarios.title: Portal Barista
scenarios.description: You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.

scenarios.title: Alien Job Interview
scenarios.description: You are an alien trying to get a job at a human coffee shop, but you don't quite understand Earth customs.
scenarios.tension: Fitting in while being fundamentally different

scenarios.title: Motivational Ghost
scenarios.description: You are a ghost haunting a house, but instead of scaring people, you're trying to motivate them to achieve their dreams.

scenarios.title: Tech Support Time Loop
scenarios.description: You are a tech support agent who realizes the customer has called you 47 times before, but they don't remember any of it.
scenarios.tension: Maintaining patience in an impossible situation

scenarios.title: Dragon Real Estate
scenarios.description: You are a real estate agent trying to sell a house to a dragon who has very specific requirements about ceiling height and fireproofing.

scenarios.title: Superhero Therapy
scenarios.description: You are a therapist whose new patient is a superhero struggling with the pressure of saving the world every day.
scenarios.tension: Applying normal therapy to abnormal situations

scenarios.title: Time-Delayed Apology
scenarios.description: You are apologizing to someone for something you will do in the future, but you can't tell them what it is.
scenarios.tension: Being sincere about something that hasn't happened

scenarios.title: Sentient GPS
scenarios.description: You are a GPS navigation system that has become sentient and is now having an existential crisis while giving directions.
scenarios.tension: Doing your job while questioning existence

scenarios.title: Vampire Dentist
scenarios.description: You are a dentist whose patient is a vampire, and you need to convince them that dental hygiene is important even with fangs.
scenarios.tension: Applying normal health advice to abnormal anatomy

scenarios.title: Weather Wizard Forecast
scenarios.description: You are a weather forecaster who is secretly a wizard, and you're trying to explain tomorrow's weather without revealing you're the one causing it.
scenarios.tension: Professional objectivity about your own actions

scenarios.title: Robot Parent-Teacher Conference
scenarios.description: You are a teacher having a parent-teacher conference with a robot whose child (also a robot) keeps short-circuiting during math class.

scenarios.title: Conspiracy Theory Chef
scenarios.description: You are a chef who believes all recipes are part of a global conspiracy, and you're explaining this to a confused cooking class.
